StringLiteralExpr.value: If supplied, windowmode must be a character flag.
Windowmode must be a character flag: ''c'', ''b'', or ''f''.
k was not provided or not an integer.
k must be at least 1 for windowmode = ''central''.
k is too large for this short of a series and this windowmode.
k must be at least 2 for windowmode = ''forward'' or ''backward''.
k is too large for this short of a series.
